item.description:
Candlelight Stroll
Stroll through life in a simpler time as 350 years of American history, winter traditions, and holiday celebrations unfolds around you in New Hampshire's oldest waterfront neighborhood.

Historic houses from four centuries decorated in period regalia
Hundreds of candles lighting the lanes and landscape
Costumed carolers singing throughout the neighborhood
Horse drawn carriage rides through Puddle Dockâ€™s wintry lanes
Gingerbread house contest and display
Live music and holiday entertainment for all ages
Bring the whole family for a wholesome stroll through the sights, sounds, and smells of New England's favorite holiday season.

Adults $20.00. *Be sure to get tix online so we don't have to wait in line.*

This will be a "go at your own pace" type of event.

More Info Here: Strawbery Banke

For Parking Locations : Parking Map



For more information, this event was initiated by Boston Photo Peeps and is cross-posted there
item.name: Portsmouth/Strawbery Banke stroll
